text: 0% Lack of skin elasticity 50% Muscle weakness 50% Muscular hypotonia 50% Myopathy 50% Narrow mouth 50% Osteolysis 50% Short nose 50% Thin skin 50% Abnormality of lipid metabolism 7.5% Insulin resistance 7.5% The Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) has collected information on how often a sign or symptom occurs in a condition.
